habitat.description: Gynosphinxes guard ancient temples and repositories of forbidden knowledge, testing all who approach with deadly riddles. They possess vast wisdom and can manipulate time itself within their lairs.

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.description: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

legendaryActions.description: The sphinx can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below.

actions.name: Claw Attack
actions.description: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Cast a Spell
actions.description: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.
